title: Ikh Khatuu
description: Area in the Altai region of extreme western Mongolia containing a number of burials and other structures dated from the Bronze Age and the Turkic Period.

properties.description: Point representing the approximate centerpoint of the bulk of burials and other remains at Ikh Khatuu, after Lepetz 2022.
properties.title: Approximate Imagery location of Ikh Khatuu
